text.textblock: Part of A-424 described as follows: Beginning at the Northeast corner of said A-424; Thence, S. 03
E., 350 feet, along the East line of said A-424; Thence, S. 87
W., 1050 feet, along the West line of said A-424; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 4000 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.

W., 800 feet, along the West line of said A-205; Thence, S. 75
E., 1300 feet, along the East line of said A-205; Thence, Northwesterly, approximately 2500 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.

W., 1000 feet, along the West line of said A-881; Thence, S. 75
E., 800 feet, along the East line of said A-881; Thence, Southwesterly and Northwesterly, approximately 500 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.

E., 1050 feet, along the East line of said A-482; Thence, S. 87
W., 1100 feet, along the West line of said A-482; Thence, Easterly, approximately 2700 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.

E., 1000 feet, along the East line of said A-412; Thence, Westerly, approximately 2500 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.

Part of A-264 described as follows: Beginning at the Northeast corner of said A-264; Thence, S. 03
E., 850 feet, along the East line of said A-264; Thence, N .85
W., 600 feet; Thence, Northeasterly and Southeasterly approximately 450 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.

W., 1550 feet along the West line of said A-264, to the Point of Beginning.
ALL, of said A-79 that lies North of Farm Road 943.
